results.title: Mathematics - a foundation course: groups 1 (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Robert Clamp, BBC-TV and Open University
results.brief_description: Mathematical meaning of the term “group”, basic requirements, by inter-changing spheres in two different arrangements we can arrive at the same group, (klein 4), symmetry throughout history, predicting vibrations of water molecules.

results.title: Group Teaching -the Use of a Theme
results.brief_description: To stimulate discussion about group tuition. This film shows one group and a staff tutor plus a volunteer tutor choosing a theme and all the activities it leads to with training a particular group.

results.title: Groundwork for progress
results.creator_credit: Bill Mason, Stewart McAllister and British Transport Films
results.brief_description: Today Britain is bringing her century-old railway system up to date. The modernisation plan includes relaying lines, strengthening bridges, and viaducts, and building new stations, good sheds, sidings, and marshalling yards. Shows the engineering problems are tackled and the work carried out without dislocation traffic on the most heavily used railway system in the world.

results.title: Ground water
results.brief_description: A study of ground water; the following aspects are dealt with in detail: the funtion of water in changing the face of the earth in producing spectacular geological phenomena, and its vital importance to man; artesian systems, springs, wells, water tables, caves; such spectacular phenomena as geysers, roaring springs, hot springs, sink holes, petrification, geode fillings, and the concentration of minerals. Below the surface of the earth, often unknown to man, water works many transformations. Both animation and direct photography of well-known examples of these various phenomena, many of them famous as tourist attractions in USA are presented in this film.

results.title: Grott
results.creator_credit: Neil Robinson and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
results.brief_description: An auto-aesthetic analysis of the conceptual indeterminacy of the slides-of-our-holiday genre, probing the Milesian paranomasia inherent in the aetiology of the medium, specifically, (a)where are we going? (b)what does it all mean? (c)who are all these people?

results.title: Grill and oven cooking
results.brief_description: A comprehensive survey of all things dealing with the art of grilling and oven cooking of a variety of foods. Includes hints on cakes, pies and pastry. No 4 of a Cookery Series suitable for women’s groups and domestic-science classes.

results.title: The Grievance
results.creator_credit: Morten Parker and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: This film illustrates the orderly processing of a grievance though several stages of negotiation between union and management, showing how the right of a worker with a genuine grievance are protected under the union’s contract. It shows the case of an unto-worker who was demoted for refusing to work inside a truck cab he considered too hot. The union registers the case as a legitimate grievance; it passes through three stages of negotiation in the plant, and eventually reaches an impartial arbitrator for the settlement.

results.title: Grierson
results.creator_credit: Roger Blais and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: An affectionate tribute to Dr. John Grierson, father of documentary film, who founded and led the British documentary film movement in the 30’s and who later established the National Film Board of Canada. Reveals the drive and dynamism of this Scottish-born pioneer who through his faith in the drama of everyday life and his concept of the “creative interpretation of reality” influenced many young filmmakers in his own country and abroad. Many of them appear here to talk about the Grierson they knew. Using photographs, newsreels, interviews and excerpts from Grierson’s films this documentary brings into focus the personality of this visionary and committed filmmaker. (Awards: Toronto)

results.title: Grey squirrel
results.brief_description: A study of the well-known grey squirrel: its habitat, its food, its habits during the four seasons, and how the young squirrel is taught to climb and to play.
